long_description: Deter theft and secure your luggage with this steel web of protection. Made of flexible, high-tensile, slash-proof, stainless-steel wire which hugs your bag, eliminating access to pockets and strapped-on items. Use while traveling in areas known for pilfering, or when left unattended in hostels, trains or baggage check. Fits over wheeled luggage yet still allows access to the handle and freedom of movement in the wheels. Equips wheeled luggage and duffel bags from 24 in. to 26 in. long (dimensions respectively: 24 x 18 x 9 in. and 26 x 13 x 13 in.). Folds up and stuffs into a compact, 6 x 4 x 2 in. nylon carrying pouch for easy packing. Brass padlock and polycarbonate locking system with adjustable draw wire secures pack to fixed objects to deter theft. Approximate volume of bags the PacSafe 85 Security Web will protect: 3,400 - 5,200 cu. in. Please note: Lock is not Travel Sentry(TM) approved; locks that are approved allow airport screeners access without damaging the lock.
short_description: Deter theft and secure your luggage with this steel web of protection.
